Name: Aloft Harlem

Description: Chic extended-stay studios & apartments in a stately high-rise hotel with a rooftop lounge.

Name: Courtyard Long Island City/New York Manhattan View
Description: Modern quarters, some offering city views, in a sleek hotel with a restaurant/bar & fitness center.

Description: Upscale all-suites hotel with kitchens/kitchenettes, grocery delivery and pet perks.

Description: Contemporary lodging with full kitchens & a fitness center, plus free hot breakfast & Wi-Fi.

Name: Arthouse Hotel New York City
Description: Contemporary rooms in a fashionable lodging with a 1920s-inspired bar & an Italian eatery.

Name: Hilton Club The Residences New York
Aloft Long Island City-Manhattan View
Description: Relaxed rooms & suites in a polished lodging featuring a hip cocktail bar with regular live music.

Name: AKA Central Park
Description: Extended-stay hotel offering studios & suites with full kitchens, plus espresso & cocktail bars.

Name: voco the Franklin New York, an IHG Hotel

Name: The Lombardy

Description: Sleek property offering polished rooms with Wi-Fi access, plus a fitness center.
